plot: Bugs and Daffy are vaudevillians competing for praise from the audience. They love Bugs no matter what; just the opposite for Daffy.
title: Show Biz Bugs
plot_es: Bugs and Daffy are vaudevillians competing for praise from the audience. They love Bugs no matter what; just the opposite for Daffy.
plot_en: Bugs and Daffy are vaudevillians competing for praise from the audience. They love Bugs no matter what; just the opposite for Daffy.

cast.role: Bugs Bunny /              Daffy Duck /              Cab Driver /              Theatre Manager
cast.name: Mel Blanc
